p: Silicon electrodes were fabricated using PAU- g-PEG and PAA- g-PEG copolymers as well as PAA as binders, and their electrochemical performance was assessed using both a coin cell and 3-electrode cell (Fig.Â 4). The coin cell, in the form of a half cell, was comprised of a silicon electrode as the working electrode, and a lithium metal disk as the counter and reference electrode. For the 3-electrode cell, a piece of lithium metal was used as the reference electrode.
